data.actual_result: "Wumpus has no Friends Add friends" message appears as if you have not added any friends.
data.expected_result: List of friends that you have added should show.
data.short_description: No friends in friends list after deleting server while in voice chat.
data.steps_to_repro: - Have 2FA enabled - Be in friends list as you create a new server - Join a voice channel - Delete server and go back to friends list.
